action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'firefox #="$(pidof firefox)" ; if [ -e $firefox ]; then firefox; else echo no; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'firefox="$(pidof firefox)" ; if [ -e $firefox ]; then firefox; else echo no; fi'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'sakura -e ffmpeg -video_size 1920x1080 -framerate 15 -f x11grab -re -i "$DISPLAY" -f pulse -ac 2 -i default -ar 22050 -c:a libmp3lame -c:v libx264 -bsf:v h264_mp4toannexb -max_muxing_queue_size 9999 -f mp4 -movflags frag_keyframe+empty_moov "/home/$USER/V√≠deos/HD/Tela_$(date +"%d-%m-%Y_%H:%M:%S").mp4"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'sakura -e ffmpeg -video_size 1920x1080 -f x11grab -re -i "$DISPLAY" -f pulse -ac 2 -i default -ar 22050 -c:a libmp3lame -c:v libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -maxrate 10000k -bufsize 20000k -pix_fmt yuv420p -framerate 15 -g 52 -max_muxing_queue_size 9999 -f mp4 -bsf:v h264_mp4toannexb -movflags frag_keyframe+empty_moov "/home/$USER/V√≠deos/HD/Tela_$(date +"%d-%m-%Y_%H:%M:%S").mp4"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'zenity --icon-name applications-multimedia --info --title="Status da Reprodu√ß√£o" --text="$(catt status)" --width="600" height="600"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'time=`zenity --entry --text "Defina o tempo que voc√™ quer avan√ßar" --title "Tempo do v√≠deo"` ; catt seek "$time"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'catt cast $(xclip -selection clipboard -o) #you_url=`zenity --entry --text "Insira o link do Youtube ou outro Streaming que deseja ser exibido" --title "Streaming"` ; catt cast "$you_url"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "pactl set-sink-mute 0 toggle ; pactl set-sink-mute 4 toggle"

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png" ; mkdir -p ~/.local/songs/ ; cd ~/.local/songs/ ; wget -nc https://github.com/felipefacundes/dotfiles/blob/master/config/songs/camera_shutter.mp3?raw=true -O camera_shutter.mp3 ; paplay ~/.local/songs/camera_shutter.ogg'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot -d 4 "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png" ; mkdir -p ~/.local/songs/ ; cd ~/.local/songs/ ; wget -nc https://github.com/felipefacundes/dotfiles/blob/master/config/songs/camera_shutter.mp3?raw=true -O camera_shutter.mp3 ; paplay ~/.local/songs/camera_shutter.ogg'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot -s "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png"'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c 'cd ~/ ; mkdir -p "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/" ; scrot -u "$HOME/Imagens/Captura de Tela/Captura de tela de %d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S.png" ; mkdir -p ~/.local/songs/ ; cd ~/.local/songs/ ; wget -nc https://github.com/felipefacundes/dotfiles/blob/master/config/songs/camera_shutter.mp3?raw=true -O camera_shutter.mp3 ; paplay ~/.local/songs/camera_shutter.ogg'

action.name: Execute
action.command: bash -c "sakura -m -e sudo pacman -Syyu --noconfirm; sudo mkinitcpio -P; sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg"
